meaningMnemonic:
Remember how 始める means "to begin something"? 始め is its noun version and means "beginning," as in the start of an action or process. に marks a point in time. So 始めに means <vocabulary>in the beginning</vocabulary>. 

始めに can also mean <vocabulary>to begin with</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to start with</vocabulary> when introducing an opening action, like 始めに、ウォーミングアップをしましょう (let's begin with some warm-up exercises).
readingMnemonic: The reading is kun'yomi (look at all that hiragana!) but that's the reading you learned with the word 始める, so have no fear, you got it!
